item.title: Placing Objects? please help
item.dc:creator: @_X1 [X]
item.description:
@_X1 wrote:

Search for public void NewObjects() {
Add this makeGlobalObject(xxxx, yyyy, objectidhere, 0, 10);//chest

Obviously change the co-ords and the id. Hope it helped.

Read full topic

item.title: Placing Objects? please help
item.dc:creator: @The_Prodigyscape The Prodigyscape
item.description:
@The_Prodigyscape wrote:

makeglobal

Find this ^
You should see plenty of these. v

makeGlobalObject(3306, 3204, 2783, 0, 10);//anvil makeGlobalObject(2798, 2796, 4877, 0, 10);//general stall makeGlobalObject(2795, 2794, 2565, -3, 10);//gem stall makeGlobalObject(2798, 2796, 4878, 0, 10);//scimitar stall makeGlobalObject(2797, 2796, 4876, -2, 10);//magic stall makeGlobalObject(2799, 2794, 2562, -1, 10);//silver stall makeGlobalObject(3298, 3202, 2560, 0, 10);//silk stall makeGlobalObject(2975, 3393, 6552, 0, 10);//magic altar makeGlobalObject(2768, 2756, 362, -3, 10);//barrel makeGlobalObject(3565, 3308, 4156, 0, 10);//portal makeGlobalObject(3303, 3123, 2472, 0, 10);//portal makeGlobalObject(2901, 3557, 2213, 0, 10);//bank makeGlobalObject(3185, 3434, 7319, 0, 10);//memberportal makeGlobalObject(3352, 3347, 7319, 0, 10);//memberportal makeGlobalObject(3114, 9844, 75, -3, 10);//chest makeGlobalObject(3114, 9843, 75, -3, 10);//chest makeGlobalObject(3114, 9842, 75, -3, 10);//chest makeGlobalObject(3118, 9836, 299, -1, 10);//haystack makeGlobalObject(3121, 9842, 2416, -1, 10);//strength makeGlobalObject(2759, 3493, 2465, -1, 10);//trainportal makeGlobalObject(3354, 3347, 2474, -1, 10);//pkportal makeGlobalObject(3116, 9846, 2213, 0, 10);//bankz makeGlobalObject(2605, 3157, 2213, -1, 10);//banks makeGlobalObject(2761, 3501, 1276, -1, 10);//regtree makeGlobalObject(2754, 3501, 1308, -1, 10);//willowtree makeGlobalObject(2754, 3495, 1307, -1, 10);//mapletree makeGlobalObject(2761, 3495, 1309, -1, 10);//yewtree makeGlobalObject(2757, 3498, 1306, -1, 10);//magictree makeGlobalObject(2989, 3388, 61, 0, 10);//altar makeGlobalObject(3121, 9838, 2513, 0, 10);//target makeGlobalObject(3469, 9488, 76, -3, 10);//kalphitechest makeGlobalObject(2890, 3545, 7288, 0, 10);//gmaulportal makeGlobalObject(3054, 3437, 4483, 0, 10);//bankchest makeGlobalObject(3096, 3468, 767, 0, 10);//chest makeGlobalObject(3426, 3536, 2213, -1, 10);//bankbooth makeGlobalObject(3429, 3539, 104, -2, 10);//openchest makeGlobalObject(3427, 3539, 104, -2, 10);//openchest makeGlobalObject(3179, 3445, 4877, -3, 10); makeGlobalObject(3178, 3446, 2562, -1, 10); makeGlobalObject(3179, 3444, 4878, -3, 10); makeGlobalObject(3179, 3443, 4876, -3, 10); makeGlobalObject(3178, 3441, 2565, -1, 10); makeGlobalObject(3178, 3439, 2560, -1, 10); makeGlobalObject(3361, 3346, 2213, -1, 10); makeGlobalObject(3362, 3346, 2213, -1, 10); makeGlobalObject(3117, 9843, 6, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(3120, 9845, 6, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2758, 3493, 2213, -2, 10); makeGlobalObject(2757, 2785, 2213, -1, 10); makeGlobalObject(2757, 3493, 2213, -2, 10); makeGlobalObject(2786, 2786, 4861, -1, 10); makeGlobalObject(2796, 2784, 4767, -1, 10); makeGlobalObject(2901, 3564, 9320, -1, 10); makeGlobalObject(3117, 9841, 7319, -2, 10); makeGlobalObject(3429, 3536, 7319, -2, 10); makeGlobalObject(2842, 3738, 7319, -2, 10); }
After all of the ones you see copy the whole line and paste it before the last } of that.
Then the first 2 numbers are hte coords, 3rd number is the id of the box, and the rest would be where it faces 10 is type donâ€™t mess with that.
